TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SatelliteContractVersionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SatelliteContractVersionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SatelliteContractVersionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示 物件要求特定版本的附屬組件。

span.span: Instructs a object to ask for a particular version of a satellite assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 桌面應用程式Desktop Apps 在桌面應用程式，屬性建立主要組件和其所有的附屬項目之間的合約。In desktop apps, the attribute establishes a contract between a main assembly and all its satellites. 您將此屬性套用至您的主要組件，並將它傳遞將會使用這個版本的主要組件的附屬組件的版本號碼。You apply this attribute to your main assembly, and pass it the version number of the satellite assemblies that will work with this version of the main assembly. 當資源管理員 (物件) 的資源查閱，明確載入主要組件的這個屬性所指定的附屬項目版本。When the resource manager ( object) looks up resources, it explicitly loads the satellite version specified by this attribute on the main assembly. 當您更新主要組件時，您就會遞增其組件版本號碼。When you update the main assembly, you increment its assembly version number. 不過，您可能不想出貨的附屬組件的新複本，如果現有的應用程式相容。However, you might not want to ship new copies of your satellite assemblies if the existing ones are compatible with your app. 在此情況下，增加主要組件的版本號碼，但保留相同的附屬合約版本號碼。In this case, increment the main assembly's version number but leave the satellite contract version number the same. 資源管理員會使用現有的附屬組件。The resource manager will use your existing satellite assemblies. 如果您想要修改的附屬組件，但不是在主要組件時，遞增版本號碼，在您的附屬項目。If you want to revise a satellite assembly but not the main assembly, increment the version number on your satellite. 在此情況下，出貨發行者原則組件，以及指出新的附屬組件具有回溯相容性的舊的附屬組件的附屬組件。In this case, ship a publisher policy assembly along with your satellite assembly stating that your new satellite assembly has backward compatibility with your old satellite assembly. 資源管理員仍然會使用舊的合約號碼寫入主要組件中，根據屬性; 不過，載入器會繫結至原則組件所指定的附屬組件版本。The resource manager will still use the old contract number written into your main assembly based on the attribute; however, the loader will bind to the satellite assembly version that is specified by the policy assembly. 共用元件的供應商有關已發行的組件的特定版本的相容性陳述式會使用發行者原則組件。A vendor of a shared component uses a publisher policy assembly to make a compatibility statement about a particular version of a released assembly. 發行者原則組件是強式名稱組件具有格式名稱`policy...`，且會註冊中。A publisher policy assembly is a strongly named assembly that has a name in the format `policy...`, and is registered in the . 發行者原則會產生從 XML 組態檔 (請參閱) 使用[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)工具。The publisher policy is generated from an XML configuration file (see the ) by using the [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) tool. 組件連結器會搭配`/link`選項即可連結至資訊清單的組件，然後儲存在全域組件快取中的 XML 組態檔。The Assembly Linker is used with the `/link` option to link the XML configuration file to a manifest assembly, which is then stored in the global assembly cache. 廠商隨附包含 bug 修正維護版本 (service pack) 時，可以使用發行者原則組件。The publisher policy assemblies can be used when a vendor ships a maintenance release (service pack) that contains bug fixes. ## [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式 Apps 中會忽略此屬性[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式，因為封裝資源索引 (PRI) 檔案並沒有語意版本設定。This attribute is ignored in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, because package resource index (PRI) files do not have versioning semantics. 此外，[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]封裝模型需要在相同的封裝，而不重新部署附屬組件或 PRI 檔案中隨附的所有資源。In addition, the [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] packaging model requires all resources to ship in the same package, with no possibility of redeploying satellite assemblies or PRI files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string version) cil managed

param.name: version
param.span: 字串，指定要載入之附屬組件的版本。

span.span: A string that specifies the version of the satellite assemblies to load.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性`version`參數。This constructor initializes the property with the `version` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As String
public: property System::String ^ Version { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得具有必要資源的附屬組件的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the satellite assemblies with the required resources.

value.span: 字串，包含具有必要資源之附屬組件的版本。

span.span: A string that contains the version of the satellite assemblies with the required resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的屬性指出將使用與主組件的附屬組件版本會標示了這個屬性。The current property indicates the version of the satellite assemblies that will be used with the main assembly marked with this attribute.
